synopsis.text: Lonely and ailing, high school student Taka finds himself in Hokkaido, seeking a cure for his chronic illness. One night, a mysterious man on a horse appears, introducing himself as Cu Chulainn. Taka inexplicably recognizes him and feels a strange connection. Cu Chulainn instructs Taka to open the moonlight shadow window, leading him to the enchanting world of Nymphidia, the realm of the fairies. Based on Ryoko Yamagishi's 1978 manga, this anime follows Taka as he encounters legendary figures and faces the daunting task of becoming the new Fairy King to save Nymphidia from the malevolent Queen Mab. With peace hanging in the balance, Taka must find the strength to restore harmony in this magical land.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
